# Chapter 4: Alarm Escalation

**Alarm Escalation** is the process of **notifying alarms up the hierarchy**, to the interested **notification groups**, according to pre-configured **escalation matrices**.

**Escalation levels** are configured for each **Alarm Class** in a way that if no action is taken at the **first level** within a given time, Alarm is routed to the **notification groups** at the **second level**, and again still if there is no action taken at the timeout for the third escalation level the alarm being routed to a **notification group** at a **third level** if it is configured.

## Alarm Notification Groups

This section describes the following:

1. Configure Alarm Notification Group
2. Edit a Notification Group
3. Delete a Notification Group
4. Search Notification Group

<mark style="color:blue;">Setting under App Configuration</mark>\
_<mark style="color:blue;">**Alarm Notification Groups**</mark>_ _<mark style="color:blue;">configured under this (Settingsü°™Alarm Escalationü°™Alarm Notification Groups) will be displayed under the ‚ÄúAlarm Escalation Disable Notification Group‚Äù Drop Down box in App Configuration page (Settingsü°™Manageü°™App Configurationü°™Alarm Escalation) to be selected as the respective Alarm Notification Group.</mark>_

**Path**\
**Settings** icon ![](data:image/png;base64,)**ü°™ Alarm Escalation sectionü°™ Alarm Notification Groups**

### Configure Notification Groups

1. Click the **Settings** icon ![](data:image/png;base64,) and select **Alarm Notification Groups** under **Alarm Escalation** section. **Alarm Notification Groups** search page will appear.
2. Click on **New Alarm Notification Group** link. **New Alarm Notification Group** dialog box appears.
3. In the **Group Name** box, type a unique and appropriate name for the new **Notification Group**.
4. Click **Add** to create the new **Notification Group**. Click ![](<.gitbook/assets/icon\_3 (6).png>) icon to close and abort the operation.
5. Go to **Notification Group** details page.
6. Click on **Add a Member** link. **User Search** page appears.
7. Select a **User** from the **User Search** page.
8. Repeat the steps 6, 7 to keep adding the **Users**, you want in this **Notification Group**.

### Edit Notification Group

1. Click the **Settings** icon ![](data:image/png;base64,) and select **Alarm Notification Groups** under **Alarm Escalation** section. **Alarm Notification Groups Search** page will appear.
2. Type the name of the **Notification Group** in to the **Search Alarm Notification Group** input box to search for the **Alarm Notification Group.**
3. Click on the name of the **Notification Group** to be edited. Detail page will appear.
4. Click on ![](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABQAAAAVCAIAAADJt1n/AAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAAlwSFlzAAAOxQAADsEBIwAp+wAAAHFJREFUOE9jfPn0KgO5gIlcjSB9Q1QzI8EASy9qhIfLzL565DAi4GdknZhBi08zfp34QpugTpyasepE8zB2zUTqxKKZeJ3omknSia4Z01eYItjjGWItsmr8OrE7G6KHoE6cAUaMTqBmwmkbT4YfovkZAMP6Krehe7yWAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) icon on top right corner to edit the **Notification Group name** and click **Save.**
5. Click on **Add a Member** link. **User Search** page appears.
6. Select a **User** from the **User Search** page.
7. Repeat steps 5, 6 to keep adding the **Users** you want in this **Notification Group**.
8. Click on ![](data:image/png;base64,) icon on the far right of each group member name to remove the member from the group.

### Delete Alarm Notification Group

1. Click the **Settings** icon ![](data:image/png;base64,) and select **Alarm Notification Group** under **Alarm Escalation** section. **Alarm Notification Group search** page will appear.
2. Type the name of the **Alarm Notification Group** in to the **Search Alarm Notification Group** input box to search for the **Notification Group** you want.
3. Click on the name of the **Notification Group** to be deleted.
4. On the right side pane, click on the **Delete Alarm Notification Group** link or ![](data:image/png;base64,) icon to delete this **Alarm Notification Group**.
5. A message box to confirm deletion appears. Click **Delete** to confirm deletion of the **Alarm Notification Group,** or to close the message box without deleting, click ![](<.gitbook/assets/icon\_3 (6).png>)icon.

#### If the Alarm Notification Group is in use

An **Alarm Notification Group** which is in use cannot be deleted.

### Search Alarm Notification Groups

1. Click the **Settings** icon ![](data:image/png;base64,)and select **Alarm Notification Groups** under **Alarm Escalation** section. **Alarm Notification Group Search** page will appear.
2. Type the name of the **Alarm Notification Group** in to the **Search Alarm Notification Group** input box to search for the **Alarm Notification Group.**

## Alarm Escalation Matrix

**Alarm Escalation Matrix** allows you to add **Alarm Notification Groups** to each Escalation Level of an Alarm.

First escalation message will be sent based on the time you have given as the shortest Escalation time considering whether **Working Hours** or **After Hours**.

Alarm Escalation Matrix will be populated with records which allow you add Alarm Notification Groups to each Escalation Level of the selected Alarm. Each Alarm will have a record on Alarm Escalation Matrix with the associated details (Equipment Template, Point Template, Alarm Message, and Alarm Class) along with the 5 Escalation Levels. You need to add Alarm Notification Groups to each Escalation Level under Working Hours and After Hours.

**Path**\
**Settings** icon ![](data:image/png;base64,) ü°™**Alarm Escalation sectionü°™ Alarm Escalation Matrix**

To add Alarm Notification Groups to each Escalation Level on Alarm Escalation Matrix;

1. Go to Settings menuü°™ Alarm Escalation ü°™Alarm Escalation Matrix.
2. In the Search Alarm box, type the required Alarm to search for it.
3. Click the ![](data:image/png;base64,)icon of Escalation Level. A pop-up window appear to add Alarm Notification Group.
4. Click **Add a Group** link and select the required Alarm Notification Group.
5. Add Notification Groups to rest of the Escalation Levels as well.
